name: Diomedian Horse
description: The Diomedian Horse is a formidable, large beast with exceptional strength and agility, showcasing its impressive muscular build and natural armor.
memorable: Its ability to knock targets prone and strike with pack tactics makes it a dangerous enemy in combat.
goals: To engage in combat and protect its allies while using its abilities to overwhelm opponents.
relations: Likely found in groups with other beasts, potentially alongside other combat-focused creatures.
environment: Often found in areas where it can roam freely, such as plains or open fields.
strengths: High strength and mobility combined with pack tactics allow it to be highly effective in group combat situations.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its strategic capabilities and makes it predictable.
attacks: Multiattack with a powerful Bite and Claw, capable of dealing significant piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pounce allows it to knock creatures prone for additional attacks, enhancing its offensive strategy.
senses: Keen Smell grants it advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.
skills: Average perception abilities indicated by a +1 modifier.
additional_information: Ability to work well with allies through Pack Tactics.
Exceptional durability with a high Constitution score.
Simple-minded, as indicated by its very low Intelligence.
test_queries: powerful large horse with pack tactics
horse that knocks opponents prone and bites
beast that excels in strength and combat
agile horse with keen smell ability
large horse that attacks in packs
